scripts.schema:generate: pkl eval config/main.pkl --project-dir config -f yaml -o config/out/openapi.yaml && pkl eval config/main.pkl --project-dir config -f json -o config/out/openapi.json
scripts.schema:web: mkdir -p web/schema && cp -r config/out/openapi.yaml web/schema/openapi.yaml; cd web; pnpm schema
scripts.format: pnpm format:dart && pnpm format:js; cd web; pnpm format; cd -
